member.name: T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Common.Platform.TokenCloudCredentialsProvider

member.name: P:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.CertificateCloudCredentials.SubscriptionId
member.summary: Gets subscription ID which uniquely identifies Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every call that you make to the Service Management API.
